markdownRemark.html: For over a year and half I have been happily blogging on Medium. I was quick to sign up when the platform first launched (and snag that elusive @seanmcp handle) but was slow to start writing. Then, in the summer of 2017, I enrolled in the Iron Yard and was encouraged to blog my process.
